dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 7753 IH: Preventing Homelessness for Veteran Families Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Pappas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend authority for supportive services for very low-income veteran families in permanent housing.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preventing Homelessness for Veteran Families Act.

section.header: Extension of authority for supportive services for very low-income veteran families in permanent housing
section.text: Section 2044(e)(1) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new subparagraphs:
